scripts.create-pods: cat app_template.json | sed -e "s/REPLICA_COUNT/$REPLICA_COUNT/" | sed -e "s/APP_ROOT_URL/$APP_ROOT_URL/g" | sed -e "s/APPNAME/$APPNAME/g" | osc create -f -
scripts.dont-create-apps: for x in $(seq 0 $INSTANCE_COUNT) ; do cat app_template.json | sed -e "s/APPNAME/sketch-$x-pod/g" | sed -e "s/APP_ROOT_URL/$APP_ROOT_URL/g" ; done
scripts.create-apps: for x in $(seq 0 $INSTANCE_COUNT) ; do cat app_template.json | sed -e "s/APPNAME/doodle-$x-pod/g" | sed -e "s/APP_ROOT_URL/$APP_ROOT_URL/g" | osc create --config='./client_config' -f - ; done
